name: Sprint Training
description: Developing explosive acceleration and top-end sprinting speed through drills.

cards.title: Acceleration Drills for Speed Development
cards.description: Improving explosive first steps and acceleration phase of sprinting.
bulletpoints: Start in a low, forward-leaning stance
Drive the knees and pump arms aggressively
Use short, powerful strides for maximum speed

cards.title: Flying Sprints for Maximum Velocity
cards.description: Enhancing top-end sprinting speed with gradual acceleration phases.
bulletpoints: Build up to top speed over 30-40 meters
Maintain relaxed shoulders and efficient arm mechanics
Keep ground contact time minimal for maximum efficiency
